name: 4kpx-tahitian-women-on-the-beach.gif
description:
This is a minimal reproduction of Tahitian Women on the Beach (from Paul Gauguin, 1891), which investigates how much information we can subtract to a digital art reproduction without losing its function and enjoyability.
The original artwork has been reduced to a maximum of 64*64px (4kpx) and its color-depth decreased to max. 16 web-safe colors.
This artwork is part of the “Minimal Art History” series: http://www.gbxstudio.com/projects/minimalarthistory/
